ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Another question, this one about speed of the game itself.
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know for sure, but I believe I read on one of the EQ tech boards that the time it takes to load a new zone is dependent (among other things) on how
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know for sure, but I believe I read on one of the EQ tech boards
that the time it takes to load a new zone is dependent (among other
things) on how fast your computer can load the textures and images used in
that new zone. From experience, I did notice a slight increase in the
time it took to zone when I upgraded my AMD athlon 600 from 64 megs to 192
megs. Of course, 64 was a little under powered anyway so I might have just
brought it up to normal speed...

Mackmillan
11th lvl Barb Shaman
Innoruuk
